channel.title: dcos on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in dcos on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Dcos Series Part 5 Gitlab
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Gitlab an open source developer tool (like Github) that allows you to host git repositories, review code, track issues, host Docker images and perform continuous integration, and it is very compatible for a small team wit CE version.

item.title: Dcos Series Part 4 Deploy Simple Application With Backend Database
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Create an Application with Golang First of all, we will go with Golang because Go is easy to implement backend server and deploy in 1 min.

item.title: Dcos Series Part 3 Service Discovery And Load Balancing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Mesosphere Datacenter Operating System (DCOS) provides useful tooling for service discovery and load balancing. One of the primary tools is Marathon Load Balancer, which will be the focus of this post.

item.title: Dcos Series Part 2 Deploy Simple Applications
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There are so many interesting things in DC/OS GUI (Dashboard with useful metrics/status from all nodes, Services tab help us to know which application/service is running on which node, its status, etc.

item.title: Dcos Series Part 1 Quick Look Installation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is DC/OS ? DC/OS - Data center OS is based on the production proven Apache Mesos distributed systems kernel, combining years of real-life experience with best practices for building and running modern applications in production.
